topics.topic_html:
<sn><md class="p-1 p-md-2 my-2" data-rr="true">### Top 100 Important Windows Commands  

| **Command** | **Description** |
|------------|---------------|
| `winver` | Shows Windows version |
| `cmd` | Opens Command Prompt |
| `powershell` | Opens PowerShell |
| `taskmgr` | Opens Task Manager |
| `msconfig` | Opens System Configuration |
| `services.msc` | Opens Services Manager |
| `gpedit.msc` | Opens Group Policy Editor |
| `regedit` | Opens Registry Editor |
| `dxdiag` | Opens DirectX Diagnostic Tool |
| `devmgmt.msc` | Opens Device Manager |
| `diskmgmt.msc` | Opens Disk Management |
| `eventvwr` | Opens Event Viewer |
| `netplwiz` | Manages user accounts |
| `control` | Opens Control Panel |
| `sysdm.cpl` | Opens System Properties |
| `ncpa.cpl` | Opens Network Connections |
| `powercfg.cpl` | Opens Power Options |
| `main.cpl` | Opens Mouse Properties |
| `intl.cpl` | Opens Region and Language settings |
| `mstsc` | Opens Remote Desktop Connection |
| `cleanmgr` | Opens Disk Cleanup |
| `chkdsk` | Checks and repairs disk errors |
| `sfc /scannow` | Scans and fixes system files |
| `dism /online /cleanup-image /restorehealth` | Repairs Windows image |
| `ipconfig` | Displays IP configuration |
| `ipconfig /all` | Shows detailed IP configuration |
| `ipconfig /flushdns` | Clears DNS cache |
| `ping <IP>` | Checks network connectivity |
| `tracert <IP>` | Traces route to an IP |
| `nslookup <domain>` | Gets DNS info for a domain |
| `netstat -an` | Displays network connections |
| `tasklist` | Lists running processes |
| `taskkill /f /im <process>` | Kills a process |
| `shutdown /s /t 0` | Shuts down the system |
| `shutdown /r /t 0` | Restarts the system |
| `shutdown /l` | Logs off the user |
| `wmic` | Windows Management Instrumentation |
| `net user` | Lists user accounts |
| `net user <username> <password>` | Changes user password |
| `net share` | Shows shared folders |
| `net use` | Connects to a shared folder |
| `net localgroup administrators <user> /add` | Adds user to admin group |
| `netsh wlan show profile` | Displays WiFi profiles |
| `netsh wlan show networks` | Shows available WiFi networks |
| `netsh wlan disconnect` | Disconnects WiFi |
| `netsh advfirewall reset` | Resets Windows Firewall |
| `assoc` | Displays file associations |
| `attrib +h <file>` | Hides a file |
| `attrib -h <file>` | Unhides a file |
| `cipher /w:C:\` | Securely deletes files |
| `fsutil file createnew <file> <size>` | Creates a file of given size |
| `gpupdate /force` | Updates Group Policy |
| `whoami` | Displays current user |
| `hostname` | Displays computer name |
| `systeminfo` | Shows system information |
| `tree` | Displays folder structure |
| `dir` | Lists files in a directory |
| `cd <path>` | Changes directory |
| `mkdir <folder>` | Creates a new folder |
| `rmdir /s /q <folder>` | Deletes a folder |
| `del /f /q <file>` | Deletes a file |
| `copy <src> <dest>` | Copies files |
| `xcopy <src> <dest> /e /i` | Copies directories |
| `robocopy <src> <dest> /mir` | Copies and syncs directories |
| `move <src> <dest>` | Moves files |
| `ren <old> <new>` | Renames files |
| `type <file>` | Displays file content |
| `find "text" <file>` | Searches for text in a file |
| `clip` | Copies output to clipboard |
| `echo Hello > file.txt` | Writes text to file |
| `more <file>` | Views file content page-wise |
| `set` | Displays environment variables |
| `setx VAR value` | Sets an environment variable |
| `path` | Displays system PATH |
| `fc <file1> <file2>` | Compares two files |
| `schtasks /query` | Lists scheduled tasks |
| `schtasks /create` | Creates a scheduled task |
| `bcdedit` | Modifies boot settings |
| `bootrec /fixmbr` | Fixes MBR |
| `bootrec /fixboot` | Fixes boot sector |
| `bootrec /scanos` | Scans for OS installations |
| `bootrec /rebuildbcd` | Rebuilds boot configuration |
| `diskpart` | Opens Disk Partition tool |
| `list disk` | Lists all disks |
| `select disk <n>` | Selects a disk |
| `clean` | Erases disk |
| `convert gpt` | Converts disk to GPT |
| `format fs=ntfs quick` | Formats a disk |
| `mountvol` | Displays volume GUIDs |
| `getmac` | Displays MAC addresses |
| `powercfg /batteryreport` | Generates battery report |
| `powercfg /hibernate on/off` | Manages hibernation |
| `wevtutil qe System /c:10` | Shows last 10 system logs |
| `logman` | Manages performance logs |
| `driverquery` | Lists installed drivers |
| `wmic product get name` | Lists installed programs |
| `start <program>` | Runs a program |
| `sc query` | Lists services |
| `sc start <service>` | Starts a service |
| `sc stop <service>` | Stops a service |
| `sc delete <service>` | Deletes a service |
</md></sn>
